embeds.title: Pings That Don't Annoy You
embeds.description:
Tired of getting a @everyone ping for small events? We have solutions. Instead of high ranks choosing when to ping you, you can choose when you want to be pinged.
​

fields.name: <:ShitCloud:1058094025095249991> Shit Ping
fields.value: > If you have this ping, our high ranks can ping you whenever they want. Sometimes the pings are helpful.

fields.name: <:Events:1058094012910796900> Events Ping
fields.value: > Whenever a high rank hosts an event, they will ping you. This is for active members.

fields.name: <:Polls:1058094040467378276> Polls Ping
fields.value: > Our high ranks will ping you in [polls](https://discord.com/channels/972686079830401135/1046206594284789780) whenever there is a poll.

fields.name: <:Giveaway:1058094054929342645> Giveaway Ping
fields.value: > Our high ranks will ping you whenever there is a giveaway.
